body_content.explanation: the act of entering a country by force with large numbers of soldiers in order to take possession of it again:
examples: The reinvasion of the country prompted an international crisis.
The proposed reinvasion of the mainland never materialized.

body_content.explanation: an occasion when a large number of people or things come back to a place in an annoying and unwanted way:
examples: Farmers are spraying trees to prevent a reinvasion of their orchards by the flies.
We have seen a re-invasion of some inner-city areas by young professionals.
